column4: Is there someplace to download security updates besides security.ubuntu.com?  I'm getting an average of less than 1KB/s
there are mirrors generally.. in synaptic, you can manage your sources.. i.e. pick the country, etc.

I did manage to pick a mirror there that will be used for most updates.  For some reason, some are still trying to download from security.ubuntu.com instead of gtlib.gatech.edu where the rest of the stuff does.
